name: Ley Line Disorder: Skyward Patrol
description:
When the battle begins: Dvalin will begin with Skyward Patrol attached.
When the Skyward Patrol effect attached to Dvalin ends: Attach Exhausted Plunge.
When the Exhausted Plunge effect attached to Dvalin ends: Re-attach Skyward Patrol.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the battle begins:</color> $[A2502] will begin with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C402014]</color> attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the $[C402014] effect attached to $[A2502] ends:</color> Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C402015]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the $[C402015] effect attached to $[A2502] ends:</color> Re-attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C402014]</color>.
